person.persName: Hickman P. Richie (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Zack Richie and Betsey McDaniel Richie. Father of Mary E. Richie, John H. Richie, Margaret E. Richie, Rosette E. Richie, Fortbosia Ritchie, Zachariah B. Richie, and Isaac R. Ritchie. Married to Nancy Holmes Richie in Nichols County, Kentucky, on May 14, 1860. Father of Martha Josephine Ritchie, Levity Ritchie, and McPherson Ritchie. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Enrolled in 7th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) on August 1, 1862. Reported as missing following Battle of Big Hill in Madison County, August 23, 1862 before officially mustering in to Federal service. Subsequently reported as deserted. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1863.
